Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Ginger Tree Boutique Resort in Anjuna (Anjuna - Vagator), you'll be convenient to Ozran Beach and Anjuna Beach. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Anjuna Flea Market and Vagator Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 24 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and ceiling fans.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a fitness center.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Ginger Tree Boutique Resort. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available on request) and a train station pick-up service.


Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is 10 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Ginger Tree Boutique Resort. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Ozran Beach - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Anjuna Beach - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Anjuna Flea Market - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Vagator Beach - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Chapora Fortress - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Miraculous Cross - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
St. Michael's Church - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Saturday Night Market - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Baga Night Market - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Baga Beach - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Morjim Beach - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Calangute Beach - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Calangute Market - 5 km / 3.1 mi
St. Alex Church - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
St. Anthony's Chapel - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi

The preferred airport for Ginger Tree Boutique Resort is Goa (GOI-Dabolim) - 25 km / 15.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
